reviews.review: gg
A really great game, truly a must buy for anyone who uses Steam.
One of the best game of all time! Also really funny.

I really enjoyed the first one so I figured what the hell might as well try this one. I can honestly say the story line of this game is amazing and the humor behind the story line in this game its just priceless if you are looking for something that will just be fun to play you are going to love this game.

Then to make it better after you beat the game you can hit the workshop and download user made maps which just makes the game that much better you can find countless hours of puzzles that will leave you enjoying this game for days if not weeks. All the way around this game has always been a really original idea and has really solid one of a kind gameplay. Well worth looking into if you enjoy puzzles that leave you thinking with a good story line.
I just wish I had this gun in real life...
Play Portal first, of course.  This game is very full compared to Portal- the longer story and co-op modes will keep you busy.
QAQ
Definitely a must-play! One level gave me terrible motion sickness though :(
A must for everyone to play through at least once

Awesome, It mixes great puzzles, has action, and Amazing storyline. Like the co-op too.
5/7 Perfect game
Physics is like math but fun.
Einfach ein muss
I don’t want your damn lemons! What am I supposed to do with these?
Este jogo é bom pra quem gosta de desafios mentais
A "must have" game.  Do it...do it now.

The first three-dimensional puzzler I've played that doesn't feel gimmicky. The storyline is gripping and the venerably scripted and warmly voice-acted characters show off some of the greatest sarcasm, in the world, ever. 

It can feel a bit short, but the co-operative mode is masterfully conceived and doesn't recycle single player levels. Once you've gotten through that, there are plenty of community test chambers to get lost in. Some of them are quite tricky.
El mejor juego reciente de acertijos/aventura. En diabladamente divertido.
Головоломка не для дешёвок!

Éste ha sido mi primer juego en Steam y el que me ha lanzado a jugar en PC. 
Siempre he jugado con consola y quería este juego. Sin embargo el precio no bajaba lo suficiente para poder comprarlo. 

Me bajé Steam para probar demos y ver quál era el rendimiento de mi Portátil para saber si podría jugar a algo en PC. 

Me sorprendió gratamente y en navidades vi este juego a 3'75€.
Una locura pensé, valía 30€ o más en consola. Me lo bajé y lo pude disfrutar encima a 60fps 1080p 
Muy bien optimizado. Además del cooperativo online, steam workshop, etc...Sólo por 3€

Encantado de poder jugar a tantos juegos por tan poco en vez de solo catar algunos pocos después de haberme informad mucho en consola. Debo decir que gracias a éste juego ahora disfruto de 100 juegos en mi colección. 

El Juego es una maravilla. Graficos no creo que necesite más. Esta muy pulido. La historia te engancha y el final es diferente al esperado. 

Además de los nuevos puzzles con pintura etc. 

El doblaje lo encuentro perfecto y me encanta la voz de Aleix Estadella, actor de Inuyasha también entre otros. 

Me parece una obra de Arte.
Muhteşem. Kütüphanemdeki en iyi ilk üç oyuna rahatlıkla girer, sırasını da biraz zor kaybeder. Çok sağlam, çok iyi, çok çok çok bir oyun. Alın lan.
Had a lot fun playing portal and portal 2.

Do you understand how fantastic this game is?

DO YOU?
Best Game EVER!
This game is a must have for people who love puzzle games with a little humor.
Awesome game.
Challenging, Funny and a great game

Seriously it's Portal 2. Humor, a portal gun, and an even longer sequence of intereesting puzzles then the utterly amazing Portal.

What's not to love?
10/10 - Well designed puzzle-gameplay, original witty comedy, great story, overall an unforgettable experience. Most notable addition from the original is co-op which is a joy to play!
I highly recommend this awesome game. I have had hours of fun both on the single and multiplayer aspects of the game. A real must buy!!!!!
PORTAAAAAAAL
Very nice game ,if you like brain teasers and making fun with science ,this game is for you :D
must have
Loved it. Even better than Portal. An amazing story, amazing ending, and equally amazing puzzles in each level.
Brilliant puzzles and an amazing story.

Como posso definir Portal 2 ? Otimo ? Fantastico ? Incrivel ? NÃO,não tem como definir Portal 2 com um palavra,nunca vi jogo tão otimo como esse,não pensem duas vezes antes de comprar,a historia singleplayer é fantasticas os puzzles são bem legais,sem contar com a campanha do co op que também é bem legal,e ainda conta com +1000 mapas no workshop,um mapa que recomendo ? Mapas do Raidix de preferencia o Gelocity é demais,como sempre a Valve criou outra maravilha do mundo dos games <3 Portal 2,virei fan do jogo nas primeiras 2 horas recomendo bastante ainda mais se você tiver um amigo pra jogar co-op 100/10

5/5

Excelente jogo! Ainda melhor do que o já excelente primeiro.
It's like Stephen Hawking on crack.
Demasiado bueno...
Get  it.
If anything, get it for the genius writing.  Though it's short, the game's so much fun you could replay it multiple times.
This game will never get old.
Fuckin Awesome
Um jogo incrível  *o*

Great improvement to the first game + nice co-op campaign.
9/10
It may not be addictive, yet most co-op dependent game ever, excelling L4D and TF2. Enjoy the feel when the "blink!" feel kicks in while you are stuck.

ＰＯＲＴＡＬ１を飛ばして
２から始めてもなんの問題もありませんが、
１を知っていると、
ニヤリとするところが随所に散りばめられています

シングルプレイでも十分楽しめますが、
２になって初のコーププレイができるのが
一番のオススメ！
細かな設定で、二周目も十分遊べます
名作です！　１００点中９６点
Muito bom! Por vezes dá que pensar... ^^
Gelungene Fortsetzung mit einigen neuen Ideen
Great game, give it a shot.

This game is about feels. If you dont like feels, forget about playing it. The entire HL universe is amazing and Portal part into it is no exception. I'm so GLaD that there are people able to make this kind of plot, gameplay, soundtrack and mainly the mix of all these into a unique and marvelous game.
How can I be a gamer and NOT reccommend Portal 2? Seriously though, Portal 2 is one of those games that not only begs but deserves to be played. Trust me, you will be better for it.

For a game that has stayed my favorite game of all time for two years, and held itself at the top-5 list since, it's hard to write a review capable of describing the sheer joy I felt playing through it. Since there are so many improvements from the first game, I'll just point out some of the things I noticed.

-Improved story, gameplay, characters, diolouge, levels, and everything else you can think of since the first Portal game came out.

-Better graphics, puzzles, and movement compared to the first one.

-An average of 5-6 hours longer than the first game (based on how I played through it)

Overall, this game is amazing and definitely worth playing. If you have already, I salute you for your good choice in games; if you haven't, change that.

10/ 10
Would play again. Have played again. Enjoyed it all 4 times.
How could you not buy the best puzzle game ever?
Very fun to play and quite challenging! Also the co-op mode is great!
Vale a pena pra quem gosta de puzzle. O jogo é muito engraçado e tem uma dificuldade razoavel. Quem gosta de desfaio pode baixar varios mapas, no Workshop do stem, tanto para single player quanto MP.

Single player is fun and made me laugh a few times. But the keeps entertaining me with the coop mode.

Every now and then I still play this with a friend. A very nice coop game with lots of maps made by fans. If you want a break from all those multiplayer games with feeders, ragers, flamers or grievers, this whould be a nice game to play with a friend.
unlimited game! perfect for have fun with friends in co-op mode and enjoy the main history
Great game even after finishing it on the xbox four times I just had to do it once more in the PC version ^^
Jumping Simulator X-II Tactics of Lighting
Must Have! :D
Gioco bellissimo sopratutto se giocato in cooperativa con i tuoi amici!
I'm back, bitch !
классная игра!!!
Just an amazing game and a must play to call yourself a gamer.

"think with portals."  that is the most helpful piece of advice you can possibly get in this game. i was amazed to see how they took a short 2 hour game and made a fulfledged game out of it that is full of life, and has a beutifully scripted storyline. i was amazed at every single test chambers ability to be s simple in layout yet be vastly challenging at the same time. if you are looking for a first person shooter that makes you think logically (and causes headaches from time to time due to frustration or confusion.) portal two is for you you can feel that valve really poured their hearts and souls into portal 2 and went all out. i would also like to bring up that this game has a level creator that is simple yet vast in possiblility in total i give portal 2 two thumbs up and a
8.2 out of 10
(mainly as there isnt a huge amount of replay value)
If you've played the original Portal, this next version is truly a QUANTUM LEAP over the first!  Brilliant and engaging.  Highly recommended!
Portal 2 is so fun get it or buy the First one  or its demo on steam and Portal the demo has a gitch

One of the best puzzle games I've played since I was a little child. No, one of the best game ever! Exercise your mind like the good old Crazy Machines serie, still funny like LucasArt's adventure games. 10/10 for me!
Не люблю думать, НО это шедевр!
Its fun if you like to think and solve puzzles butt my friends dont think the gel is fun. If you do you should also try "Tag  the Power of Paint"

If you loved the first Portal, than this game is a must have. It is its own standalone game, so there is much much more hours of gameplay, as well as a new co-op mode, which has even more hours of gameplay.

Once you get past the story and co-op, the game isn't over there. There are thousands upon thousands of custom test chambers to download and play, so the fun never ends! If you feel creative enough,  you can even make your own test chambers for your friends and the community to enjoy!
If you liked the first Portal, or a re just looking for a puzzle game with a ton of humor, look no further than Portal 2.
So awesome; Life changing

Portal 2 — это саркастическая ГЛэДОС и молчаливая Челл. Portal 2 — это неумолкающий Уитли и весёлые Пи-боди и Атлас. Portal 2 — это атмосфера испытаний, это смертельные и увлекательные головоломки, это захватывающий  геймплей, чередующий упражнения на ловкость и смекалку. 
Portal 2 — это шедевр.
one of my favourite games of all time. puzzles + glados = win.
게이머라면 한번쯤 접해가야만 하는 말이 필요없는 명작게임. 폭력성이나 성적요소를 완전히 배제하여 누구에게나 추천해 줄 수 있는 게임이기도 하다.

I don't have much to say about this game. Just buy it!
And you have a good friend to play with you, even better!
The game is infinite, you can always download new challenges and fry your brain trying to solve it xD

Portal 2 is an awesome puzzle game with hilarious dialogue and tons of unforgettable moments! I highly recommend this game to anyone who wants to have a great time full of laughter and amazing gameplay. This game is perfect in every way. I dare you to come up with something negative about it.
First FP game with "just one more level and I can go to bed" effect :-)

Portal/Portal 2 sind Spiele, mit der wahrscheinlich interessantesten Spielmechanik. Obwohl ich mir von der Story nichts erhofft habe, war sie doch gut, wenn auch nicht umfangreich. Wenn man das Spiel durchgespielt hat kann man noch viele Räume mit einem Freund im Koop-Modus spielen und auch Räume aus dem Steam-Workshop spielen. 
Mein Fazit: für so wenig Geld eine tolle Kampagne und lustigem Koop-Modusist sehr gut und ich erhoffe mir bald den Nachfolger!

Portal2 ist ein Denkspiel mit kniffligen Situationen. Im Coop-Gaming kann man sich gemeinsam das Hirn zermadern, bis man taktisch und mit Überlegung zu einer Lösung findet, oder per Zufall.

Zugegeben, dass Spiel ist für die wenigen Maps (Welten) recht hochpreisig, aber durch den Steamworkshop gibt es mittlerweile unzählige neue Maps, bei denen einige sich wirklich sehr viel Mühe gemacht haben um diese zu entwerfen.

Wer sein Gehirn noch etwas zu futtern geben möchte und noch einen Coop-Partner findet, der wird seine reine Freude an dem Spiel finden.
Best
Everything you loved about the first one made bigger and better.
fun and challenging game that envolves portals
nice
Everyone should Own this... One of the best games  by Valve. 9/10

What a game, i don't know what else can i say... 
Story: perfect 
Gameplay: perfect 
Graphics: amazing 
Is it funny? yes
Does it have good puzzles? YES

A must play for any kind of gamer :)
Recommended.
An absolutely amazing game, Portal 2 features an excellent blend of humor and challenging puzzles
One of the best co-op experiences I have ever played.

Portal ja Portal 2 on pelejä josta riittää pelattavaa vuosikausiksi. Pelkästään yksinpeli on mahtava kokemus ja moninpeli tuo peliin tonnikaupalla hauskuutta. Myös omien kenttien suunnitelu tuo oman kiinnostavan ulottuvuutensa peliin ja lisää sen elinkaarta tuntikaupalla. Kuuluu kaikkien kevyistä älynystyrä hieronnasta kiinnostuneiden pelikirjastoon. 


95/100
Great game! Fun, whitty, and great to play with your best friend. Plus you can run it on almost any computer.
Everyone should play this game!
Must have.
Are you still there?
It's like Skyrim, with (portal) guns
Interesting & Challenging

Incredible game. The storyline is both compelling and hilarious. The co-op is great and the workshop is fantastic. Not a single flaw, however it is not a game that I really play everyday, every week, more like it. You will be pleasantly surprised if you are looking for an adventure/puzzler. Amazing game.

10/10
